metadata.title: CVE-2016-6354 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the yy_get_next_buffer function in Flexbefore 2.6.1 might allow context-dependent attackers to cause a denial ofservice or possibly execute arbitrary code via vectors involvingnum_to_read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6354` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flex - 2.6.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flex package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.1-1').
